description:
Yang Tailong was the father of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] and a citizen of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance]. He worked as an interstellar trader, frequently traveling between Heinessen and Phezzan, alongside his young son. A committed capitalist, Tailong believed that it was the duty of the people to accumulate wealth, because money was power and only with money could they keep the politicians in check. He died in 783 UC.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Yang Tailong
